data.title: McHenry County Property Tax Inquiry
data.text: Welcome McHenry County Taxpayers! To pay online enter either your 1) parcel number/PIN or 2) search by name or 3) address in the Parcel Criteria box below. Once you hit the search button, you will go to the next screen where you can click on the green Pay Taxes button. This will take you to a landing page where you can either choose to PAY NOW (as a One-Time Payment) or register as a VIP Taxpayer. By subscribing to be a VIP Taxpayer you can schedule your payments, receive reminders, and electronically receive your tax bill next year. Remember you can pay your taxes when you PAY NOW as a one-time payment or as VIP Taxpayer using eCHECK (direct debit from your checking account) which is FREE, or Debit Card ($4.00 fee) or Credit Card (2.4% of payment amount).
